org.spongepowered.api.potion

Interface PotionEffect

  • All Superinterfaces:
    DataSerializable

    public interface PotionEffect
extends DataSerializable
    Represents a possible Potion Effect.

    PotionEffects can be added to Living entities via Living.addPotionEffect(PotionEffect, boolean).

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getAmplifier()
      Gets the amplifier at which this potion effect will apply effects.
      int getDuration()
      Gets the duration for which this potion effect will apply for.
      boolean getShowParticles()
      Gets whether or not this potion effect should show particles.
      PotionEffectType getType()
      Gets the PotionEffectType of this potion.
      boolean isAmbient()
      Gets if the potion effect is an ambient effect.

      Sets if the potion effect is an ambient effect.

      Sets the amplifier at which this potion effect will apply effects.

      Sets the duration for which this potion effect will apply for.
      void setShowParticles(boolean showParticles)
      Sets whether or not this potion effect should show particles.
